HomeProject Status

Summary

Update: July 5, 2018

Citadines Berawa Beach Bali is a short walk from cafés, restaurants and recreational outlets at Berawa beach, Canggu. We provide guests with 230 units comprising studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments. We will offer picturesque sea views and a range of facilities including swimming pools at the rooftop and ground floor, a rooftop bar, gymnasium, spa, children’s playroom, social spaces and function room.
